setwd("..")

Lüdecke, D., Makowski, D., Ben-Shachar, M. S., Patil, I., Waggoner, P., Wiernik, B. M., & **Thériault, R.** (2024). performance: Assessment of Regression Models Performance (R package version 0.10.8.10) [Computer software]. https://easystats.github.io/performance/

```{r, out.height="12pt"}

knitr::include_graphics("img/performance.png", dpi = NA)
```
